title: B.S. Report - Grantland's Oscar Preview pt 2
description: In Part 2 of Grantland's Oscar Preview, Chris Connelly, Wesley Morris, and Bill Simmons discuss Cooper's and DiCaprio's star power, the academy and race, and more.
